You will get your reward payment in full; your reward payment will already be known when you select that option.Let's say, for example, that you selected six games and you picked the option that if one of them cut (loose) out of the six, you still win. The moment you select that option, your potential winning amount will be decided. Even if the entire game happens to be played, the amount won't reduce or increase; it's just that amount that you saw before confirming your bet that you will receive.
